pr_title: Mgmt: refactor deprecated function in Sql

timeline.message: remove deprecated function in sql server
remove simple withSku, will add with enum later
add unit test for sku generation

timeline.bodyText:
This might better return a new Sku object.
Else user might do DatabaseSku.HYPERSCALE_HS_GEN5_80.toSku().withTier(...) to get the underlying Sku modified.
timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft

timeline.bodyText: Just curious, does anyone has a non-null size?
